description:
Whether you're looking at your first set of clipless pedals or training for your a Fondo, these pedals provides the adjustability and construction needed for years of service.

  • Stainless steel contact surface is hard wearing
  • Chromoly spindle is designed for years of service
  • 500mm² of contact surface provides a big platform for tough sprints
  • Release values are adjustable to match your riding style
  • Stack height is 17.3mm
name: Look KeO 2 Max Pedals
